architecturalNotes: Project organized as an ICP dapp with a Motoko backend canister and a Vite+React frontend, with generated DID typings used by the frontend actor.
Frontend uses Tailwind + shadcn/ui components; lint rules include constraints around BigInt query keys and Internet Identity provider usage.
Build template and scripts include image resize/prune utilities and deployment configuration (icp.yaml, canister.yaml, deploy.sh).

Build-template and core infrastructure were updated across backend/frontend scaffolding files (Motoko main.mo, Vite+React+shadcn/ui template, lint rules, and deploy configs), reflecting a template/component version refresh (core-infrastructure:v1.0.2, shadcn-ui:v1.0.0, build-template-react:v1.0.0, initial-app:v1.0.0, github-export-icp-cli:v1.0.0).
